projects.name: If It Fits Your Mouth
projects.description: If It Fits Your Mouth is a macronutrients calculator for flexible dieting (If it fits your macros). Uses the Mifflin St. Jeor formula to calculate the user's bmr. Returns recommended calorie and macronutrient intake for specific goal.

projects.name: LFG Collab
projects.description: An online project hub for users to collaborate on projects together. Host your own room or browse the project bulletin for a project you want to be a part of. Collaborate in real-time.

projects.name: Floppy Drop
projects.description: Interactive browser game where player collide with falling objects to earn points. Draw contact for easy points, avoid charges, referees help the most.

projects.name: Real Life RPG
projects.description: Gamified task manager/goal tracker. Level up real life skills by completing activities and reaching your goals.

projects.name: Health-Track-O-Bot 3000
projects.description: Streamlined health tracker. Enter health stat, track meals and workouts, receive personalized feedback.

projects.name: Heathly Recipes Gem
projects.description: Ruby gem that scrapes the web for over 500 healthy recipes. Browse recipe by category, ingredients, or portion size.
